desc: who says wax crayons should be boring? Bring your little ones pictures to life with a beautiful set of handmade wax crayons in a variety of fun shapes

layout.text: Home of the coolest crayons around

Beautifully crafted wax crayons in a whole variety of shapes and styles, Handmade from my workshop in North Yorkshire & inspired by my own children's love of colouring , there's a box full of fun in every one.
